name: SSF2
title: Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: Neurovascular Invasion
notes:
**Note 1:**  Nerves, veins, and arteries tend to travel together in neurovascular bundles. Neurovascular invasion may be defined as involving the nerve structures and/or vascular structures within these bundles.

**Note 2:**  Neurovascular invasion is based on histologic examination of the primary tumor and should be reported where possible.  Code as stated in the pathology report.
rows: Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
No histologic examination of primary site
